last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: In this episode of "Wreck Hunters", hosts Ernie Lopez and Wowie Wong meet some of the vanguards of the waters of Boayan Bay, San Vicente, Palawan. Ditchay and Philippe Girardeau's "love story" has always revolved around their shared love and passion for the oceans. After settling down in what they consider paradise, they literally fought their way to the hearts and minds of local fishermen in their efforts to spread the concept of environmental sustainability. With the help of both the private and public sectors, and an interesting twist of fate, the Boayan Bay artificial reef system was born. Who would've thought that a burning fishing vessel would turn out to be one of the most relevant wrecks to be hunted?

name: Wreck Hunters
overview: Join hosts, Ernie Lopez and Wowie Wong, as they pack their gears and take along years of diving experience to bring you closer to the Philippines' amazing wrecks. Travel to breathtaking underwater destinations and dive into stories of war and peace, triumphs and defeats, and discover the secrets of the deep. Revel at the beauty and history that lies beneath the tranquil waters of the Philippine seas and experience the rush that comes with wreck diving.
